abstract.text: Control Abloy locking devices from within your app.

inlineContent.text: The Abloy Mobile SDK is a drop-in solution that will
allow you to securly operate and manage your Abloy locking
devices from right inside your app.
Control locking device scanning, unlocking and locking,
as well as claiming to your organisation.
